title.en: Robot Special Attack Team + Private Gokuraku

altTitles.ja: ロボット特攻隊+ごくらく三等兵

description.en:
"This is why I don't want to be in the military.'' What will be the fate of the third-class robot soldier who was transferred from an anti-aircraft gun unit to a special attack unit by lottery? Simultaneously recording ``Goraku 3rd Class Private'' and "Robot Grandpa'', the heroic story of a robot soldier, in which the gokuraku duo receives a red card!!

[Commentary]
Koremitsu Maetani's 29th collection of masterpieces is a combination of the
activities of a third-class robot soldier in a special attack unit and the strange military life of a simple duo! Also includes a former military man's ``Robot Grandpa''! !


<Robot Special Attack Team>
A third-class robot soldier who was selected by lottery to join the special attack team
becomes unable to sleep due to the pressure of the sortie, so he takes sleeping pills.
As expected, I overslept during the sortie time...?

<Private Third Class>
A red paper has been delivered to the Gokuraku duo, who have been living in a quiet place every day
! Even after joining the
army, the Bearded Regiment Commanders are always at the mercy of these two who don't let go of their own pace...

<Robot Grandpa>
A third-class robot grandpa cuts off untidy
soldiers!?
